K1:promises-benchmark kaerus$ make benchmark
node scenarios/serial/index.js

:: Benchmarks for: Serial (no noise)
›› microPromise x 33.30 ops/sec ±2.28% (80 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 27.03 ops/sec ±1.43% (67 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 34.77 ops/sec ±1.41% (83 runs sampled)
›› Q x 16.97 ops/sec ±5.47% (45 runs sampled)
›› When x 31.79 ops/sec ±3.79% (55 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 29.33 ops/sec ±3.03% (72 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: Pinky (synchronous) 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Serial (some noise)
›› microPromise x 30.93 ops/sec ±2.73% (76 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 23.92 ops/sec ±1.99% (61 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 31.41 ops/sec ±1.32% (76 runs sampled)
›› Q x 14.74 ops/sec ±5.61% (40 runs sampled)
›› When x 29.22 ops/sec ±4.17% (72 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 27.54 ops/sec ±2.96% (68 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: Pinky (synchronous), microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Serial (noisy)
›› microPromise x 29.00 ops/sec ±3.13% (71 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 21.69 ops/sec ±1.68% (56 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 28.50 ops/sec ±1.72% (70 runs sampled)
›› Q x 13.29 ops/sec ±6.55% (66 runs sampled)
›› When x 26.66 ops/sec ±4.49% (67 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 25.45 ops/sec ±2.96% (64 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Serial (mostly noise)
›› microPromise x 22.91 ops/sec ±3.71% (58 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 15.68 ops/sec ±1.26% (76 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 20.31 ops/sec ±2.02% (52 runs sampled)
›› Q x 8.93 ops/sec ±5.09% (47 runs sampled)
›› When x 20.28 ops/sec ±2.92% (52 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 20.05 ops/sec ±3.44% (52 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q
node scenarios/light-serial/index.js

:: Benchmarks for: Lightweight serial (no noise)
›› microPromise x 56.53 ops/sec ±2.62% (71 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 43.19 ops/sec ±1.71% (71 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 53.00 ops/sec ±1.55% (84 runs sampled)
›› Q x 24.15 ops/sec ±6.43% (61 runs sampled)
›› When x 50.99 ops/sec ±4.80% (64 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 50.46 ops/sec ±4.11% (79 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Lightweight serial (some noise)
›› microPromise x 49.99 ops/sec ±3.21% (80 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 35.79 ops/sec ±1.48% (85 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 45.70 ops/sec ±1.83% (74 runs sampled)
›› Q x 20.67 ops/sec ±6.12% (52 runs sampled)
›› When x 47.03 ops/sec ±3.87% (60 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 46.70 ops/sec ±3.23% (76 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Lightweight serial (noisy)
›› microPromise x 45.29 ops/sec ±3.14% (74 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 30.91 ops/sec ±1.59% (75 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 39.16 ops/sec ±2.01% (65 runs sampled)
›› Q x 17.23 ops/sec ±4.58% (45 runs sampled)
›› When x 42.26 ops/sec ±3.75% (69 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 41.93 ops/sec ±3.13% (69 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Lightweight serial (mostly noise)
›› microPromise x 31.97 ops/sec ±3.34% (77 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 19.84 ops/sec ±1.64% (52 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 26.19 ops/sec ±2.06% (65 runs sampled)
›› Q x 10.75 ops/sec ±5.71% (54 runs sampled)
›› When x 28.12 ops/sec ±3.97% (49 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 29.41 ops/sec ±3.37% (72 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q
node scenarios/parallel/index.js

:: Benchmarks for: Parallelism (no cache)
›› microPromise x 104 ops/sec ±1.77% (78 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 98.35 ops/sec ±0.71% (79 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 97.77 ops/sec ±1.00% (79 runs sampled)
›› Q x 72.47 ops/sec ±4.57% (71 runs sampled)
›› When x 102 ops/sec ±3.09% (82 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 85.30 ops/sec ±2.49% (80 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Parallelism (small cache)
›› microPromise x 108 ops/sec ±1.71% (86 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 106 ops/sec ±0.86% (84 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 105 ops/sec ±1.17% (84 runs sampled)
›› Q x 76.50 ops/sec ±4.85% (74 runs sampled)
›› When x 110 ops/sec ±3.06% (75 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 90.52 ops/sec ±2.36% (82 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: When 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Parallelism (big cache)
›› microPromise x 179 ops/sec ±2.14% (85 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 163 ops/sec ±1.09% (86 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 173 ops/sec ±0.99% (85 runs sampled)
›› Q x 113 ops/sec ±5.91% (69 runs sampled)
›› When x 182 ops/sec ±3.51% (69 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 142 ops/sec ±3.01% (77 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: When, microPromise 
Slowest: Q

:: Benchmarks for: Parallelism (fully cached)
›› microPromise x 366 ops/sec ±2.65% (72 runs sampled)
›› Pinky x 309 ops/sec ±0.99% (79 runs sampled)
›› Pinky (synchronous) x 355 ops/sec ±1.22% (75 runs sampled)
›› Q x 187 ops/sec ±6.31% (56 runs sampled)
›› When x 382 ops/sec ±2.87% (51 runs sampled)
›› Deferred x 255 ops/sec ±3.50% (82 runs sampled)
--- 
Fastest: When, microPromise 
Slowest: Q
